bibliography:
1909, Platos Logik des Seins,
Gießen: Töpelmann.

1921, Grundzüge einer Metaphysik der
Erkenntnis, Berlin-Leipzig: De Gruyter.

1923, “Wie ist kritische Ontologie
überhaupt möglich?”, Kleinere Schriften, 3, Berlin: De
Gruyter, 1958, 268–313.

1923–1929, Die Philosophie des deutschen
Idealismus. I: Fichte, Schelling und die Romantik, II:
Hegel, Berlin-Leipzig: De Gruyter.

1926, Ethik, 3 vols., Berlin: De
Gruyter.

1931, “Systematische Philosophie in
eigener Darstellung,” H. Schwarz (ed.), Deutsche
systematische Philosophie nach ihren Gestaltern—Band I,
Berlin: Junker und Dünnhaupt, 283–340.

1933, Das Problem des geistigen
Seins. Untersuchungen zur Grundlegung der Geschichtsphilosophie und
der Geisteswissenschaften, Berlin: De Gruyter.

1935, Zur Grundlegung der Ontologie,
Berlin: De Gruyter.

1938, Möglichkeit und Wircklichkeit, Berlin: De
Gruyter.

1940, Der Aufbau der realen Welt. Grundriss der allgemeinen
Kategorienlehre, Berlin: De Gruyter.

1943, Neue Wege der Ontologie, in N. Hartmann,
Systematische Philosophie, Stuttgart: Kohlhammer, 199–311.

1949, “German Philosophy in the Last Ten Years”,
Mind, 58: 413–433.

1950, Philosophie der Natur. Abriss der speziellen
Kategorienlehre, Berlin: De Gruyter.
1953, Ästhetik, Berlin: De Gruyter.

1932, Ethics, London: George Allen & Unwin; reprinted
with new Introductions by A. A. Kinneging, Transaction Press,
2002–2004.

1949, “German Philosophy in the Last Ten Years”,
Mind, 58: 413–433 (originally published in English).

1953, New Ways of Ontology, Chicago: Enry Regnery Co;
reprinted Westport: Greenwood Press, 1975; New Brunswick: Transaction Publishers, 2012.

2012, “How is Critical Ontology Possible?”, 
Axiomathes, 2012, 22:3, pp 315–354.
2013, Possibility and Actuality, Berlin: De Gruyter.

2014, Aesthetics, Berlin: De Gruyter.
Possibility and Actuality (2013). Berlin: De Gruyter.
Aesthetics (2014). Ed. by Eugene Kelly. Berlin: De Gruyter.

Albertazzi, Liliana, 1994, “The Psychological Whole. 1. The
Temporal Parts of
Presentation”, Axiomathes, 5(1):
145–175.

–––, 2001, “Vittorio Benussi
(1878–1927)”, L. Albertazzi, D.  Jacquette, and R. Poli
(eds.), The School of Alexius Meinong, Ashgate, Aldershot,
95–129.

–––, 2003, “From Kanizsa Back to Benussi:
Varieties of Intentional
Reference”, Axiomathes, 13(3–4):
239–259.

–––, 2005, Immanent Realism: An Introduction
to Brentano, Dordrecht: Springer.

–––, 2006, “Introduction to Visual
Spaces”, L. Albertazzi (ed.),
Visual Thought. The Depictive Space of Perception, Benjamins,
Amsterdam 2006, 3–34.

Bell, John, 1998, A Primer of Infinitesimal Analysis,
Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.

Benussi, Vittorio, 1913, Psychologie der Zeitauffassung,
Winter: Heidelberg.

Brentano, Franz, 1981,
The Theory of Categories, The Hague: Nijhoff.

–––, 1987,
On the Existence of God, Dordrecht: Nijhoff.

Boros, Bianka 2015, Selbstständigkeit in der
Abhängigkeit. Nicolai Hartmanns Freiheitslehre,
Würzburg: Ergon-Verlag.

Cadwallader, Eva H., 1984, Searchlight on Values: Nicolai
Hartmann’s Twentieth-century Value Platonism, Lanham: University
Press of America.
Cicovacki Predrag 2014, The Analysis of Wonder: An Introduction to the Philosophy of Nicolai Hartmann, New York: Bloomsbury Academic.>/li>

Ebbinghaus, Hermann, 1902, Grundzüge der
Psychologie, 2 vols., Leipzig: Veit.

Findlay, John N. 1961,
Values and Intentions, London: George Allen and Unwin.

Fischer, Joachim, 2011, “Nicolai Hartmann: A Crucial Figure

Nicolai Hartmann. Leben, Werk, Wirkung, Würzburg:

Jäger, Ted and Grasso, K. 1991. “Contour Lightness and

Mohanty, Jitendranath N., 1957, Nicolai Hartmann and Alfred

Peterson, Keith and Roberto Poli, Eds. 2016, New Research on the Philosophy of Nicolai Hartmann. Berlin, De Gruyter.

Plessner, Helmut, 1985, “Geistiges Sein. Über ein Buch

–––, 2009a, “A Glimpse into the Sphere of Ideal

–––, 2010a, “Ontology: The Categorial

Vol. 1 Philosophical Perspectives, Berlin: Springer, 1–22.

–––, 2010b,
“Spheres of Being and the Network of Ontological

–––, 2011a, “Hartmann’s Theory of

–––, 2011b,
“Ontology as Categorial Analysis”, A. Slavic and E.

–––, 2016, “Pure and Qualified Time”, in K. Peterson and R. Poli (eds.), 2016, 3–22.

Poli, R., and C. Scognamiglio and F. Tremblay (eds.), 2011, The

Rescher, Nicholas, 2011, “Aporetics in Nicolai Hartmann and

Tym, M. 1991. The Imagery Debate, Cambridge, MA and

Werkmeister, William Henry, 1990, Nicolai Hartmann’s New
